scripts.lint: biome check . && cd functions && uv run ruff check src
scripts.format: biome check --write . && cd functions && uv run ruff check src --fix && uv run ruff format .
scripts.typecheck: tsc --noEmit && cd functions && uv run mypy src
scripts.test: cd functions && uv run pytest tests/unit
scripts.test:all: cd functions && uv run pytest tests
scripts.test:cov: cd functions && uv run pytest tests --cov=src --cov-report=term-missing
scripts.quality: pnpm lint && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test
scripts.setup: pnpm install && uv sync && uv run pre-commit install
